author: DJT Team
name: DJTPlayerMovement
shortDescription: Advanced platformer movement with wall-sliding, dashing, and double-jump
description:
Provides complete movement mechanics for platformer characters including:
- Variable jump height (tap vs hold)
- Double jump
- Dash with cooldown
- Wall slide and wall jump
- Sprint capability
- Input buffering
- Momentum-based physics
